mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing the Kingsdale Fire Co. Carnival featuring Sunny Miller and Happy Valley Boys, Spirits of Blue Grass, Nashville Kitty Kats, All Girl Band, Bob Hake and the Royal Vogues, and the Taylor Family in Kingsdale on August 25 through 30. Poster features a woodcut of a carnival. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/42946/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
